description: Number of letters in n (in Hungarian).
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Index entries for sequences related to number of letters in n
example: egy 2, ketto 5, harom 5, negy 3, ot 2, hat 3, het 3, nyolc 4, kilenc 6, tiz 3, ... (gy and ny count as one letter; accents have been omitted).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
